fr.sorbonne_u.components.cvm.utils

Class DCVMCyclicBarrier.HostPortSocket

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sorbonne_u.components.cvm.utils.DCVMCyclicBarrier.HostPortSocket
  • Enclosing class:
    DCVMCyclicBarrier

    protected static class DCVMCyclicBarrier.HostPortSocket
extends java.lang.Object
    The class HostPortSocket defines a tuple of three values (host name, port number and socket on which this host waits for a release signal) that must be kept when a host has sent a request for synchronisation to the cyclic barrier.

    Description

    Invariant
